text: Frederick Aaron Savage (born July 9, 1976) is an Emmy Award and Golden Globe Award-nominated American actor and television director. He is best known for his role as Kevin Arnold in The Wonder Years. ==Other websites== * *Picture Gallery *Fred Savage at NNDB * *World Poker Tour Profile Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Highland Park, Illinois Category:1976 births Category:Living people
title: Fred Savage
